block-handbooktext-ecentrifuge:
Allows grinding and recycling of all perishable items/products directly into compost. The amount of compost obtained is half compared to the vanilla method. Also supports custom recycling recipes, which will be displayed in the recycler and item description.
Supports automatic loading and unloading via chutes.
block-handbooktext-ehammer:
Simplifies and automates work on the anvil. There is a chance to obtain extra materials during processing.
Supports automatic loading and unloading via chutes.
block-handbooktext-epress:
Allows creating some items by pressing them in a mold.
Supports automatic loading and unloading via chutes.
